content: i don t have the exact amount on how much yarn i used but it is not a lot this is a nice little quick knit to add to a gift for a baby i only do one size since babies grow at such different speeds i figure that it will match up at some point there is no heal in this sock so it makes it more versatile for babies fitting into it i did a video tutorial on my youtube channel if you would like to see me knit them up i know how it s nice to see the designer actually make the design and i hope that it will be helpful to you
